item.title: Science news this week: The world's oldest rock art, giant freshwater reservoir found off the East Coast, and the biggest solar radiation storm in decades - Live Science
item.description: Science news this week: The world’s oldest rock art, giant freshwater reservoir found off the East Coast, and the biggest solar radiation storm in decades Live ScienceRock art from at least 67,800 years ago in Sulawesi NatureCan You See the Faded Outline of a Hand? Archaeologists Say This 67,800-Year-Old Stencil May Be the World’s Oldest Known Rock Art Smithsonian MagazineThe world’s oldest rock art discovered in Indonesia National GeographicThese ha…
